name: ☢️Oh no! Radioactive barrels are fighting.. again☢️
name_original: ☢️Oh no! Radioactive barrels are fighting.. again☢️
description:
A multiplayer local game where both are radioactive barrels that need to jump over platform to get their plutonium rod. The playe rwho get more rods win the game! There are different objects and 5 different maps!

If you fall to the radioactive acid you die, if you fall on the spikes you die, if a explosive barrel explodes near you you die... You will respawn a few seconds later.

Developed by me, https://claybullet.itch.io/ and https://ldjam.com/users/ricorico .
